statements: SELECT * FROM waste_facilities WHERE facility_location = 'New York';
SELECT facility_name, processing_capacity FROM waste_facilities WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT facility_name, waste_type, facility_location FROM waste_facilities WHERE processing_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities WHERE efficiency_rating >= 4.5;
SELECT facility_name, waste_type FROM waste_facilities WHERE facility_location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY processing_capacity ASC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, facility_location FROM waste_facilities WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT facility_name, waste_type, processing_capacity FROM waste_facilities WHERE processing_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY processing_capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities WHERE facility_location LIKE '%Denver%' OR facility_location LIKE '%Seattle%' ORDER BY facility_name;
SELECT facility_name, efficiency_rating FROM waste_facilities WHERE waste_type IN ('Glass', 'Paper') ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_location, efficiency_rating FROM waste_facilities WHERE processing_capacity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY facility_location, efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM waste_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_records ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, SUM(waste_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM waste_facilities JOIN waste_records ON waste_facilities.id = waste_records.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT id, facility_name, location, capacity, waste_type FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM waste_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_records WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT facility_name, SUM(waste_quantity) AS total_waste FROM waste_facilities JOIN waste_records ON waste_facilities.id = waste_records.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM waste_facilities WHERE waste_type='Hazardous' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteFacilities
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteFacilities
SELECT facility_id, capacity FROM WasteFacilities WHERE capacity > 1000
SELECT * FROM WasteProcesses ORDER BY process_date DESC
SELECT facility_name, process_type, status FROM WasteProcesses JOIN WasteFacilities ON WasteProcesses.facility_id = WasteFacilities.facility_id
SELECT * FROM WasteFacilities
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteFacilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC
SELECT facility_id, capacity FROM WasteFacilities WHERE capacity > 1000
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT facility_name, process_type, status FROM WasteFacilities JOIN WasteProcesses ON WasteFacilities.facility_id = WasteProcesses.facility_id
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteFacilities;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location, capacity FROM WasteFacilities WHERE capacity > 5000;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_type, treatment_date FROM WasteTreatment WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT facility_name, efficiency_score FROM WasteFacilities INNER JOIN EfficiencyMetrics ON WasteFacilities.facility_id = EfficiencyMetrics.facility_id
SELECT * FROM WasteFacilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteFacilities WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_facilities, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM WasteFacilities;
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(*) AS total_collections FROM WasteFacilities JOIN WasteCollection ON WasteFacilities.facility_id = WasteCollection.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name;

SELECT WasteTreatment.treatment_type, EfficiencyMetrics.efficiency_score FROM WasteTreatment JOIN EfficiencyMetrics ON WasteTreatment.facility_id = EfficiencyMetrics.facility_id WHERE EfficiencyMetrics.efficiency_score > 0.8 ORDER BY EfficiencyMetrics.efficiency_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteFacilities WHERE status = 'Operating';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteFacilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM WasteFacilities WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location, status FROM WasteFacilities WHERE location LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY facility_name;
SELECT * FROM WasteProcessing WHERE processed_weight < 500 ORDER BY processing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteFacilities WHERE status='Operating';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteFacilities WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT facility_name, capacity, status FROM WasteFacilities WHERE capacity >= 1000 AND status='Operating';
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementCompanies WHERE location='New York' AND contact_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT company_name, location, contact_name FROM WasteManagementCompanies WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY company_name ASC;
